basic.description: This course covers synoptic calculation and four-dimensional analysis of weather systems.
basic.subject: MET
basic.title: Synoptic Lecture-Laboratory II: Four-Dimensional Structure

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MET 4301 or MET 5311, MET 4420, MET 4500C, and STA 3032 or STA 4321 with a grade of "C" or better in each.
